attributes.action: amend the law so all prison sentences run consecutively ond not concurrently
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prisoners get off lightly when they commit multiple crimes, as they get sentences that run concurrently. This means that they only have to serve 1/3rd of the longest sentence before parole. if sentenced to run consecutively they would serve at least 1/3 of total sentence.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "amend the law so all prison sentences run consecutively ond not concurrently"
